title: Back to the Future
description: A young man is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.

title: Jurassic Park
description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

title: Half Life
description: Half-Life combines great storytelling in the tradition of Stephen King with intense action and advanced technology to create a frighteningly realistic world where players need to think smart to survive.

title: Madonna - Holiday
description: "Holiday" is a song by American singer-songwriter Madonna from her eponymous debut studio album Madonna (1983). Sire Records released it as the album's third single on September 7, 1983.
